Audio desync's constantly throughout the movie.  After syncing 10 times within the first 30 minutes I gave up (using VLC).

Video is not bluray quality but it is much better than your garden variety cam.

*Spoiler*

If you keep reading this then you deserve to have the plot spoiled.  Please look away if you haven't watched it yet.

I enjoyed how much this movie portrays true human nature.  We try to contact aliens.  Aliens respond by coming to visit us.  We shoot at them as a warning expecting them to understand this.  They shoot back.  After getting in a gun fight they finally stop attacking once we stop aiming our guns at them.  They attack our weapons and anything that seems to pose as a threat to them but try and leave us alive if possible.  After multiple instances of this happening we still assume they came to earth to annihilate us.  Due to hysteria we decide to eliminate them all and pretend we protected the earth from annihilation.

*Spoiler End*
